wikipedia_page.main: Dominick Roy Harrod (21 August 1940 – 4 August 2013) was a British journalist and broadcaster. He was the BBC's economic correspondent in the 1970s and 1980s.

response: *1940 – Dominick Harrod, English journalist, historian, and author (d. 2013)

Harrod married Wilhelmine "Billa" Cresswell (1911–2005), step-daughter of General Sir Peter Strickland, in 1938.Josceline Dimbleby Billa Harrod, The Guardian, 10 June 2005 One of their sons was Dominick Harrod, an economics correspondent for the BBC.Obituary: Dominick Harrod, telegraph.co.uk, 5 August 2013

** 21 August: Dominick Harrod, broadcast economic journalist (died 2013)

She married Sir Roy Harrod in 1938. One of their sons was Dominick Harrod, economics correspondent for the BBC. She was widowed in 1978. P. M. Oppenheimer, ‘Harrod, Sir (Henry) Roy Forbes (1900–1978)’, in Oxford Dictionary of National Biography (Oxford University Press, 2004)
